TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit MembershipUserCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class MembershipUserCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class MembershipUserCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type MembershipUserCollection = class interface IEnumerable interface ICollection

span.span: A collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A會傳回從， ，以及方法類別。A is returned from the , , and methods of the class. 所傳回的物件， ，和方法包含成員資格資料存放區中的使用者資訊的快照集。The objects returned by the , , and methods contain a snapshot of user information in the membership data store. 也就是變更中的成員資格使用者資訊不會反映在成員資格資料存放區。That is, changes to the membership user information in a are not reflected in the membership data store. 若要修改成員資格資料存放區中的成員資格使用者資訊，請使用，並方法類別。To modify membership user information in the membership data store, use the , and methods of the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 的成員資格功能，請參閱[成員資格簡介](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100))再繼續進行。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 如需成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用的成員資格管理使用者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳回清單的成員資格使用者的使用者數目目前在線上。The following code example returns a list of membership users with a count of the number of users currently online. 如需設定為使用成員資格的 ASP.NET 應用程式的範例，請參閱類別。For an example of an ASP.NET application configured to use membership, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/CS/ShowUserscs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/VB/ShowUsersvb.aspx#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式程式碼通常不會使用這個屬性。Application code does not normally use this property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetReadOnly() cil managed

summary.span: 將成員資格使用者集合的內容設為唯讀。

span.span: Makes the contents of the membership user collection read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容皆視為唯讀的因為它們是在成員資格資料存放區中的成員資格使用者資訊的快照集。The contents of a are considered read-only, as they are a snapshot of the membership user information in the membership data store. 使用修改成員資格使用者資訊，和方法。Membership user information is modified using the , and methods. 方法標記為唯讀，讓物件無法加入或移除集合中。The method marks the as read-only so that objects cannot be added to or removed from the collection. 屬性值物件未標示為唯讀。Property values for the objects are not marked as read-only. 也就是說，您可以修改的屬性值中無論是否集合已被標示為唯讀方法。That is, you can modify the property values of a in the regardless of whether the collection has been marked as read-only by the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳回所有使用者成員資格資料存放區。The following code example returns all of the users from the membership data store. 傳回標示為唯讀根據`Boolean`呼叫端所指定的參數。The returned is marked as read-only based on a `Boolean` parameter specified by the caller. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/CS/snippetscs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#5)]
